basics.name: Bakin Eugene
basics.label: software developer
basics.summary: I'm from Chelyabinsk, Russian Federation. I have a Master degree in Applied Mathematics and Physics from South Ural State University. I tried to continue my career path in theoretical physics, but quickly understood that my passion is more in building things than in theory. So I moved to software engineering. I started with some freelance gigs - trying various things in software development - from creating javascript plugins to working with asterisk. Then I found my first work in web-development in small outsource company "Inventix". Then I switched jobs to work for Rugion - a company which has a number of regional web-portals all over the Russian Federation. My work focuses on both front-end and back-end (PHP, JavaScript). And my desire is to switch completely to front-end development (JavaScript, CSS, HTML).

companies.summary: This is a big company that owns many regional sites in Russian Federation. (74.ru, autochel.ru, mychel.ru, etc). Aside from constant work on improvement of codebase and refactoring i am trying to increase code coverage with tests. I am part of a group working on following services: Multimedia, News, Affiche, Blogs, etc

projects.name: Internal News Management System
projects.description: I took part in redesign, reorganization amd refactoring of internal news management system. News writers, redactors and managers use it to prepare and publish articles on multiple company owned sites.

projects.name: Affiche
projects.description: This is a service to show a list of events that currently available in your city. Currently a complete redesign is taking place and all the code is beeing rewritten completely. Cassandra + Solr is used for DB

companies.summary: It is a small outsourcing company.

projects.name: Penny-This
projects.description: I was working on admin part of marketing web-application for Sweden market. It is used to generate compact e-shops that would be embedded in regular web-sites or shown on mobile phone. I was working with everything related to it - from generating email sending campaign to integrating with various payment gates.

companies.summary: This was my first job after graduation. I was working part time as a post-grad student on a software project related to my study. But then I had to leave that job due to low salary and unmet expectations.

projects.name: BTIW2c
projects.description: Software product for computing stresses and deformation in targets under severe temperature treatments. I refactored existing code to work under Linux/gfortran. Built a database based on NetCDF to store computed data and visualisation program based on python/matplotlib to plot and analyze it.
